timeline.message: Refactor interfaces for protocol and session
Update android used classes for refactored intrfcs
update symlink to new file name
Remove redundant caching of transport config

Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/smartdevicelink/sdl_android into feature/refactor_interfaces

# Conflicts:
#	android/sdl_android/src/main/java/com/smartdevicelink/SdlConnection/SdlSession.java
#	android/sdl_android/src/main/java/com/smartdevicelink/managers/lifecycle/LifecycleManager.java
#	android/sdl_android/src/main/java/com/smartdevicelink/streaming/StreamPacketizer.java
#	javaSE/src/main/java/com/smartdevicelink/SdlConnection/SdlSession.java
Run code formatter on session classes

timeline.author: JulianKast
